title: Report Low Water Pressure
description: A customer calls to report that their water pressure has been very low all day.

tasks.description: Identify the customer's account and address.
Check the network operations dashboard for any known issues, maintenance, or water main breaks in the customer's area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that a nearby water main break (from scenario utils-cs-011) is affecting pressure in the area.

tasks.description: Inform the customer about the ongoing repair work and provide an estimated time for pressure to be restored.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the cause of the issue and the ETR.
